long_description: Built for backpacking, the NEMO Mezzo Loft Sleeping Bag has all the ingredients of a cozy bed: room to stretch out, a comforter that peels back on both sides and a fitted sleeve for your sleeping pad. Bag is filled with ultrasoft synthetic fill insulation for warmth even in wet conditions; rated to keep you warm down to about 30degF. Waterproof, breathable fabric at the footbox protects your bag from condensation on tent walls; ripstop nylon through the rest of the bag has a Durable Water Repellent coating. Fitted pad sleeve is sized to accommodate the Cosmo(TM) 25L series sleeping pad to keep the bag in place while you shift around inside (sold separately). Stretchy construction retains warmth while offering maximum volume. Two Mezzo Loft bags can be zipped together to create the ultimate bed away from home. NEMO Mezzo Loft Sleeping Bag comes with a compression stuff sack and a cotton storage bag.
